body_html:
For CUDNN < 6, 4f7943f appears to have introduced a bug here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.8/tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc#L1188

But it shouldn't get hit for CUDNN >= 6.
@encore-zhou, is there any chance you have multiple cudnn versions installed and the v5 header is getting picked up instead of v6?
body_text:
For CUDNN < 6, 4f7943f appears to have introduced a bug here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.8/tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc#L1188
But it shouldn't get hit for CUDNN >= 6.
@encore-zhou, is there any chance you have multiple cudnn versions installed and the v5 header is getting picked up instead of v6?
body:
For CUDNN < 6, https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/4f7943f7358fc69af62dc280c6f6ba549ebe2167 appears to have introduced a bug here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.8/tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_dnn.cc#L1188

But it shouldn't get hit for CUDNN >= 6.
@encore-zhou, is there any chance you have multiple cudnn versions installed and the v5 header is getting picked up instead of v6?
